item.description:
Hey folks,
As my 6 month meetup subscription quickly nears I figure it would be fun to throw one last bash down Moody St in Waltham, where this Beer Meetup started. If you havent attended an event yet this would be a great, and possibly last chance! I plan on kickin things off pretty early for a Saturday night, but if you "cant make it" til later (bars close at 1) then shoot me a text message and I'll reply the current location of beer consumption.
Cheers!
item.how_to_find_us: i'll be playing scrabble & will send out phone number to yes's for late arrivers
item.name: Another good ole Moody Street pub crawl (maybe last one)
